website_summaries.verdict: A gentle cleanser that's great for several different skin types and also removes makeup.
pros: Formula is fragrance-free and gentle, so it's great for sensitive skin
cons: May not be ideal for very dry skin during winter months

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I give this product a 5 stars. I had acne on my forehead a couple years ago and have been using this and my skin is super clear. If you have never tried this i suggest you SPOT TEST in case you have a bad reaction like other people. Everyone’s skin is different. In my experience i have had nothing but amazing results. Personally, i would not order from this exact seller because i never got my order... buy it from a different seller. :)
customer_reviews.author: yarledy

customer_reviews.title: Worked amazing for me
customer_reviews.text: Bottom is before using top is after. Ever since I moved to Hawaii in March I have struggled significantly with these pesky tiny pimples on my forehead and cheeks. I’ve tried damn near every face wash you can think of from cetaphil to Clinique and this stuff is the only thing that’s kept my skin clear.
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: Holy grail face wash for sensitive combination skin!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many other face washes and never found anything that I really loved or attributed to my skin improving, but I am so happy I found FAB! I love this brand, they use quality ingredients, have reasonable prices and their stuff really works. I have sensitive combo skin and this stuff doesn't irritate it and actually seems to actually soothe redness. I have also noticed a significant decrease in breakouts since I started using it, I paid it with their moisturizer and it's a miracle duo.
customer_reviews.author: kpaz

customer_reviews.title: good but does not remove eye make up without irritation
customer_reviews.text: I like many things about this product. It is indeed fragrance free and my skin never feels dry after I cleanse. However it does not do a good job of removing my regular [not waterproof] mascara and eye pencil. Last night I was determined to use enough product to get make up off. The make up came off but my eyes are still red and burning 12+ hours later. Oh well, I will not be repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: MFD

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing; the only face wash I buy and it ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing; the only face wash I buy and it seems like I've tried it all. Its great for all skin types in my opinion, but works wonderfully with sensitive skin. Removes eye makeup incredibly easy; you won't need any other product for eye makeup removal.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi Harris

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I got a small sample size of this product in my Ipsy bag, and LOVED it. I have always had a hard time finding a product that doesn’t break my face out. This helps with breakouts, and doesn’t require a large amount. I only use a dime size. It is seriously worth it. And the trial size lasted me a couple months, so this large bottle will probably last a while.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Abbott

customer_reviews.title: FAKE. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE. COUNTERFEIT. This is clearly a counterfeit product. I’ve been using this exact face wash for over a year and never seen it with this dial soap-like texture and smell. I’m actually convinced hand soap is what’s in this bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Trina J.

customer_reviews.title: This is the best cleaner I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cleaner I have ever used! It gently removes all my makeup and that's including my eyes! It does not irritate my sensitive dry skin and only takes a small amount to cleanse my face and neck. I use to use it years ago and stopped for some reason and started using store bought brands that would require me to use an eye make up remover and toner after I washed my face. Forgot how great it is to get it all done with one step. Saves me a ton of money and time. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Susan D

customer_reviews.title: Gentle cleanser
customer_reviews.text: This is a very gentle cleanser for my older, sensitive skin. It has a very faint scent in use which dissipates when I dry my face. It leaves my skin feeling clean, but not stripped of moisture. I don’t wear much makeup and it takes it off without much rubbing. It would work with a Clarisonic or similar brush. I use a tiny bit (about the size of a pea) and it lathers up and does the job for me, so even though it’s pricier than some other brands it lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: FAKE PRODUCT. BUY FROM A REAL SELLER
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS A COUNTERFEIT PRODUCT. i always buy beauty products from amazon and have never questioned the authenticity. until today i realized this is a completely different product that the original that i purchased from ulta. the original product should be creamy and lather very lightly. this product i received is the consistency of hand soap, and i'm pretty sure that's what's inside. i expect a refund but i don't know if i can get one since i've been using it for a week. BUY FROM AN ACTUAL STORE
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Henry

customer_reviews.title: I'm on my third bottle!
customer_reviews.text: This face wash is absolutely perfect for my skin. I picked it up on a whim at Sephora and have since purchase two replacement bottles on Amazon as they run out. I have combination skin and bad hormonal acne. This face wash combined with a spot treatment keeps my skin clear and un-oily all month long. I have even converted my boyfriend and he loves the face wash, too! I highly recommend it. I also like that there are no perfumes or dyes - nice on my sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: WG

customer_reviews.title: Finally - the best facial cleanser ever.
customer_reviews.text: I do not wear make up and so I am always looking for the most gentle flash cleaner I can. There are a few nice ones out there but quite honestly the very first time I tried this face cleaner I knew I had finally found the right one. It has the most soothing gentle feel on the skin and the smell is delicious. I have left it on my skin for 1-2 minutes as a moisture mask. Love, love this cleanser. I will never buy anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Starsha

customer_reviews.title: Started out good, but then I got cystic acne :(
customer_reviews.text: So I started out loving this cleanser, it removed all my makeup perfectly and never left my skin feeling tight or stripped. But after three weeks or so of using it twice a day, I was getting really bad cystic acne that is leaving red scarring and huge bumps. I couldn’t figure out what was the cause, thought it was hormones, foods I was eating etc. when I finally realized I had started using this cleanser. Stopped using it and went back to my old cleanser and all the cystic acne is deflating and going away. So bummed! My skin hates something in this cleanser!
customer_reviews.author: Cecelia

customer_reviews.title: Good gentle cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this cleanser a cleanser a couple of times now. I like that it doesn't leave my skin feeling dry but does give a little bit of a lather. It doesn't have a scent and the product is kind of a pearlescent white, pretty! I usually put a smaller-than-a-dime amount on my fingers and rub on my face after it's wet, then remove with a wash cloth. In the shower I put it on my facial brush and then apply it via the brush when it's spinning. Overall it's a good product. I've been quite happy with every First Aid Beauty product I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren G

customer_reviews.title: Rich moisturizer with clean ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a rich moisturizer that would not make me break out; for reference, I am 39 with very sensitive skin, made worse by wearing masks during this pandemic, as I am sure I am not alone on. I like many of the First Aid products, and recently came across a few blogs and videos about this moisturizer. I am always skeptical of these kinds of reviews, aka when a person is “gifted” with products and asked to try them out, but I have actually found their reviews to be accurate, in terms of the ingredients in this product, and the moisturizer to work well thus far.
customer_reviews.author: XandLove

customer_reviews.title: Works great with sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this cleanser for about 6 months now. I have psoriasis on and around my face and this cleanser doesn’t agitate it, which most cleansers do. I also had some stress acne and it helped clear that up as well since it didn’t irritate my skin more I highly recommend this if you have sensitive skin and just want a good cleanser.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Winkler

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cleanser!
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews regarding this cleanser and I have to say that I totally agree with all of them. It lathers very nicely and removes all my makeup with just one wash. When I follow with my toner I do not see any makeup on the cotton ball. It is gentle yet it is thorough! Leaves my face smooth and clean.
customer_reviews.author: loveupnorth

customer_reviews.title: Made my face break out in a severe rash!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this lotion for months and had no problem. But this last order I got was completely different. It was a different consistency than all the other bottles. But I tried it anyways and no I have a severe rash all over my face. A rash that is so had I had to go to the doctor to get steroid cream! Do not buy this product!
customer_reviews.author: Makyla Sewell

customer_reviews.title: Too runny
customer_reviews.text: The product just runs out of the tube as its opened, a waste. And on top of that, it don't leave your face feeling clean. It does soften the skin a little, but face don't feel washed. Since using I've noticed bumps, hope it's not causing breakouts. Been using about a week now... I hope it works. So far though, for $ 20 I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: I like it's non-drying formulation
customer_reviews.text: This is the only cleanser I use. It is not pricey and completely dissolved makeup - including stubborn mascara and liner. I have not had any reaction and believe me I react to EVERYTHING. I like it's non-drying formulation. I also like foaming rather than creamy formulas. Was glad I found this after the other manufacturer stopped making the one I used for years. I also use their moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: SRKTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: This wash has helped my skin so much!!
customer_reviews.text: Best decision I’ve made for my skin! Switching from an acne medicated cleaner to this less harsh cleanser has done wonders for me! I have sensitive skin and am prone to cystic acne, so I was unsure about using a non acne medicated face wash & this stuff was just what my skin needed! This wash cleanses my skin super well, without drying me out, or leaving my skin tight. I think I am on my third bottle now, and the product is still keeping my skin clean & clear! It also has always arrived on time! Was recommended to me by a friend & I would definitely recommend as well!
customer_reviews.author: Pati

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin and this cleans really well and thoroughly without hurting my skin. You don't need a lot either, which is great. I have been using this for a few years now and love FAB... as well as their other products!
customer_reviews.author: E. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE this facewash. I have been struggling with my skin for years never could find the correct face wash I have extremely oily skin I started using this product about two months ago and I couldn’t say more great things about it I use it twice a day it’s not greasy it’s light weight it’s perfect for oily dry or any skin type
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Teal

customer_reviews.title: Brought my skin back to life: Acne, sensitive/combination skin
customer_reviews.text: I've been having a lot of issues with face washes lately. Nothing seemed to work, everything just made my acne worse. I decided to try this face wash (I've been using their moisturizer for awhile now and I LOVE it). After the first use my face felt better. Not heavy or drying. I really like this product!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this along with the toning pads. My face was needing some Major TLC and this product delivers. I was looking for something free of sulphates and other toxic ingredients. Well worth the money. My face looks fresh and acne has decreased! I will be using this for a long time to come as well as their other products! I'm hooked!
customer_reviews.author: Mamamoe

customer_reviews.title: Face did not feel clean
customer_reviews.text: This product did nothing for me. My face didn't feel clean after using this product. There was no difference in my skin after using the product for 1 full week. I was very disappointed on a product that was so highly rated. I have very oily skin so maybe this is not a good for my skin type. Another down side is the seller would not refund me my money after returning the product. They say the product is returnable but this is not the case!
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Paredes

customer_reviews.title: MIRACLE PRODUCT !!! ^-^
customer_reviews.text: This cleanser is truly amazing. I first tried it through my Ipsy subscription and immediately fell in love. There is no other cleanser that actually PREVENTS breakouts as this one does, and so perfectly at that. I love how silky smooth and creamy the texture is, but I also freakin' ADORE just how easily it foams up in my hands. For a while, I thought that I would never find the "perfect cleanser"... well, I guess First Aid Beauty proved me wrong! =)
customer_reviews.author: Evelynn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This face wash is super gentle on my sensitive skin. I tried it once when traveling and hit up a Sephora since I forgot to bring my normal face wash. Turned out it was a good thing because this gets the job done with very little product.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Not Good For Dry Skin
customer_reviews.text: I have really dry skin and if you also have dry skin, I wouldn't recommend it. This product made my skin sensitive to my other skincare products like my moisturizer and my chemical exfoliant and I usually don't have sensitive skin. Again, take this with a grain of salt. All of our skin is different.
customer_reviews.author: Toola

customer_reviews.title: Versatile for many skin types.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product when my skin was dry and when my skin was combination I started to use other products and came back to this one and fell in love with it again. It really does work well with all skin types. And I have extremely sensitive skin. Also i was using this after a major cystic acne breakout from a product that didn't like my skin and its helped it heal wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Lidia Clipperton

customer_reviews.title: FAB is the best skincare line
customer_reviews.text: I found this line a little over a year ago and I'm obsessed. I can't use anything else. so good for sensitive skin. Its also oil free and so moisturizing. Honestly, I wish this line had more "high end" packaging, because it feels so luxurious and works so well
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Grace

customer_reviews.title: Nice in-between alternative from more abrasive cleansers
customer_reviews.text: A very nice alternative between acne washes and scrubbers. Mild, no residue, and still cleans the impurities from your face and neck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sensitive
customer_reviews.text: it was exactly what i paid for. good product. not actually what i needed for my skin type but the product itself is great for people with really sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: JK kitties

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with your eyes !!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I mistakenly got some of this product in my eye and it was the WORST FEELING IN MY LIFE!!!! I have never experienced so much pain, I actually think it messed up my eye. Please be careful when using this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did the job
customer_reviews.text: I gave this three stars because it does cleanse like it is supposed to. I normally use the Cetaphil face wash, and I love that one. But I wanted to try something different and had seen great reviews of this. But my face feels stripped when I use this F.A.B face wash. I’m not sure if it’s the nature of my skin, but I wasn’t the biggest fan of it. If you’re very oily, this might be for you!
customer_reviews.author: Stacia Hamill

customer_reviews.title: gave me BAD acne
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to try this, but after a month of using, i had big pimples all over my chin and cheek. They were awful! I thought maybe it wasn't the cleanser, I paid 20$ for this and didn't want to get rid of it, but as soon as i stopped using it, my acne went away and now that i havent used it for 2 weeks, my skin is finally going back to normal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: Great face wash. I look for products that can remove makeup without leaving any behind. This does the job and it doesn’t have as many bad ingredients in it. I don’t think it necessarily moisturizes my face.
customer_reviews.author: Mike/Krista L

customer_reviews.title: No-Frills face cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This stuff does as advertised. It's a non-scented (even though it smells like crayola crayons to me), ok for sensitive skin (I have rosacea and it doesn't exacerbate my condition) cleanser. This product is pretty effective at removing everything, including any moisture from your face so make sure to moisturize afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Jen R

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Having sensitive and dry skin, I ordered this product. I thought it would be moisturizing, but it was not. Completely dried out my skin. The smell is horrendous, not in a perfumy, but in a chemical way. What a complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy SumnerTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Wash
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. After a lot of research from beauty bloggers, this face wash came up most frequently. I love it. It doesn’t have a strong sent. I have sensitive skin that’s prom to breaking out and I have had absolutely no reaction since starting this. In fact, I haven’t had a breakout since starting. It’s not drying on your face.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Dunham

customer_reviews.title: My favorite face wash I’ve tried
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my sensitive skin. Normally my face has an allergic reaction to most washes but I had zero reaction to this! A little bit goes a long way. It cleans my face AND leaves it feeling bouncy and moisturized. Love this product
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Brown

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for rosacea and sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Helps my rosacea and my skin is hardly ever mad at me anymore. It you have skin issues, I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Tara wand

customer_reviews.title: Good for sensitive and dry skin
customer_reviews.text: It's probably great for somebody who has very dry skin or lives in a dry climate. The smell is mild. They say that it's scent free but I think there are still a faint smell... Kind of reminds me of a Vaseline smell. If you do have very sensitive skin this product is awesome and worth trying.
customer_reviews.author: Tina T

customer_reviews.title: Why didn’t I hear about this cleanser sooner?!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. Only negative is that I didn’t discover it as a teen. Growing up I would get really bad acne so I started using proactiv. All proactive did for me is burn my skin and bleach my towels. Now that I’m in my 20’s, I get occasional flare ups still so when my sister introduced me to this cleanser I instantly became loyal. It works right away. It’s also great on different skin types. I have oily skin and my sister has super dry sensitive skin and it worked great for the both of us!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cleanser
customer_reviews.text: Smooth, creamy cleaner that suds up well and rinses away easily. Barely any scent which is perfect for me. Leaves skin feeling clean, smooth, and soft. This is by far one of my favorite FAB products.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Harper

customer_reviews.title: Clean and Suds for Days
customer_reviews.text: As of recently, I have had some trouble with dry skin, so I needed to replace my face wash. I choose this one. It is great. Your face feels clean but not dry after washing. A little goes a very long way. It suds up super well.
customer_reviews.author: Shavonda

customer_reviews.title: Drying
customer_reviews.text: It did the one thing it wasn’t supposed to, and left my skin super dry. Back to Neutrogens cream cleanser for me
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: A++++ for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Wow this is truly amazing for acne prone, sensitive, combo dehydrated skin. Cleans deeply but my skin never feels dry or tight afterwards and this stuff is so silky! Hg cleanser ❤️❤️
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Great skin product
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome. I work in healthcare. I wear a mask 12 hours a day. This product heals any blemishes created by wearing a mask quickly. If you work in healthcare you know what a mask does to your ears and skin. This is a life saver!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A.

customer_reviews.title: Overall just ok
customer_reviews.text: I read really great reviews on this product and decided to try it out. This is just my take since skin is different for everyone: - the smell is a little weird, kind of popcorn-ish - my face was pretty dry after washing - removes makeup just fine but struggled a bit with eye makeup since it caused a little irritation Overall it's ok, it gets the job done. But for my skin type, it tended to dry it out and cause some strange break out on the hairline. (I have never had an issue with breakouts prior)
customer_reviews.author: Bai

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cleanser. My son who is 19 has used this for a few years. He was having trouble with every other product we tried. This cleanser is just right - cleans but doesn’t strip or irritate.
customer_reviews.author: maggie england

customer_reviews.title: 100% recommend
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually do the whole face cleaner thing. But oh my goodness does this stuff feel like heaven on my skin. I get hives real easy and this stuff doesn't bother me a bit! There's air in this thing so it doesn't necessarily foam, but it is much lighter when it comes out than you expect it to be. My skin looks so fresh after using this and I feel so good all day!
customer_reviews.author: patricia J. herrin

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because I have dermatitis and this has been wonderful, contains no SLS which is great, my skin feels clean and smooth without feeling like it was harsh. This will be my new go to face wash!
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work for my skin type. I broke out from it. It’s creamy and didn’t feel like I can get all of it off. Didn’t seem to clean my face either.
customer_reviews.author: Michele G

customer_reviews.title: Great overall product
customer_reviews.text: If I had to use one face cleanser for the rest of my life, this would be it. It’s gentle and non drying but also does a great job getting the dirt and oil out.
customer_reviews.author: RJ20

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for everyday gentle wash
customer_reviews.text: Loved this for a daily face wash because it’s very gentle. Definitely keeps your skin moisturized. I have very sensitive skin and have gotten bumps on my face using most products. I felt like this helped them clear up a bit. I would not recommend this as an acne solution.. I feel like this is only good for everyday use, to wash off daily pollutants and makeup. You don’t need to use a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Bernarducci

customer_reviews.title: Best face wash ever
customer_reviews.text: Seriously the best face wash I ever used. Acne is basically nonexistent since starting to use it. I hope FAB never go out of business, I will cry.
customer_reviews.author: bixervixer

customer_reviews.title: The best cleanser - dry, sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Hands down my favorite facial cleanser I’ve ever used. I’ve received recommendations from dermatologists and none compare to this one. It is light but feels like it really does the job. I never have any leftover make up. I have sensitive skin and I have not experienced anything negative from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: That’s all I buy for 4years now
customer_reviews.text: This face cleaner is all I buy for 4 years now. The best and unbeatable. Gentle, yet takes off makeup easy. I hope this product will be around for another 50 years.
customer_reviews.author: arched bar

customer_reviews.title: Best cleanser I’ve seen!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wanting a non aggressive cleanser that Disney over strip my skin of its oil and this is the one! I use a pea size amount and my face feels fresh and soft afterwards not dry and stiff, so my face produces less sebum meaning less breakouts!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: A must in my beauty regiment!
customer_reviews.text: I love FAB products! My skin is sensitive and can not tolerate anything with scent or harsh chemicals. This product removes my make up with a gentle creamy consistency that foams easily. This has been my favorite face cleanser for the past 5 years!
customer_reviews.author: Bbrock01

customer_reviews.title: Creamy, cleans well
customer_reviews.text: Nice, creamy cleanser that gets your skin clean without over drying. Doesn't have an over powering scent. Good value compared to high end brands and works just as well.
customer_reviews.author: Shellybb

customer_reviews.title: Clean skin!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve experienced amazing skin since using this facial cleaner. Just clean and smooth. Great for sensitive skin also. Unscented is also a plus for me.
customer_reviews.author: SassyCrazi

customer_reviews.title: Must have face cleanser!
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to face cleanser! I can’t say enough good things about it. If you have sensitive skin, this is a must have! It’s creamy and moisturizing so it doesn’t leave your skin feeling dry and stripped. Takes off all of your makeup and a little goes a long way. I love this cleanser!
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: On my third bottle!
customer_reviews.text: on my third bottle of this cleanser! I’ve never used the same cleanser for more than a month or sometimes a day I used to constantly change up my skin care to find what worked for me and I finally did. I love this cleanser because it thoroughly cleanses and doesn’t over dry. I also have redness and this calms down my skin and noticeably see the difference when I wash it off. Will continue to use this product! I have acne prone, sensitive dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's whatever
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't say my skin has gotten worse because of this product, but it has not improved after a months use. I understand that facial cleansers aren't going to magically work overnight, but this doesn't do anything for me. If someone handed me this in an unmarked bottle & said "what's this?" I would guess unscented hand soap. It doesn't make my face feel tingles & jingles after cleansing & it doesn't appear to make a drastic difference. I guess I'm just bummed that I stopped using a $5 cleanser for this that was more effective. I'm giving it 3 stars because I would say my skin stayed the same, luckily it did not get worse.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Beware it will dry your skin out.
customer_reviews.text: Gave it a one star simply because it will dry your face out...is foamy!! So those with dry skin avoid this product!!!! Never buying again, am using it in the shower as a wash on skin other than my face.
customer_reviews.author: PC

customer_reviews.title: Cleans but too well.
customer_reviews.text: Cleans well, but also dries out skin a lot. I have combination skin and I won’t continue with this product. But if you have oily skin, this might work out great.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: The real deal
customer_reviews.text: The real deal!!! It is truly a gentle cleanser..i will definitely purchase some more..recommend..plus i don't pay taxes on amazon so it actually costs less here than on Sephora..thx Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Marie Saint Louis

customer_reviews.title: It does get clean out makeup really nicely, but I don't like the fact that it ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been breaking out a lot ever since using this. This was my first time trying it out. It does get clean out makeup really nicely, but I don't like the fact that it is causing my skin to breakout so much.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: ... product for the past 6 months and am very happy with the results
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for the past 6 months and am very happy with the results. Love how soft my skins feels with using this wash. I have very sensitive, acne prone skin and this has been wonderful for my skin.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only cleanser that doesn’t break me out. My sister is the same way. I love it. Specially since we both have eczema and super sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Maria J

customer_reviews.title: Best face wash!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t use any other face cleanser. I love this! It is creamy on my skin and it lathers just a little. It washes off clean but doesn’t leave my face feeling dry. Best face wash!
customer_reviews.author: XLPB

customer_reviews.title: I found my new cleanser!
customer_reviews.text: My best friend recommended this after she had hunted through so many different cleansers. I was really afraid I’d break out if I started using a new cleanser but my face has been the softest it’s even been and I’ve been using it for about 4 days now, I will make sure to update if there are any changes but Im confident I have found my new go to cleanser.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and I break out very easily. This cleanser keeps my skin fresh and soft and hasn't irritated it at all! A little goes a long way I feel like as well!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Layton

customer_reviews.title: Soothing and fragrant free
customer_reviews.text: I love this face wash. Its great for removing my make up too. Not eye make up but everything else. I have terrible skin thats dry, flakey, oily, sensitive, and acne prone. This wash calms it down and does not over dry. And a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea D.

customer_reviews.title: I was asked by Amazon if this product was easy to apply and if it needed to be reapplied ...
customer_reviews.text: I was asked by Amazon if this product was easy to apply and if it needed to be reapplied during the day. I think the assumption may be that this is makeup. This cleanser is great! It gets "They're Real" mascara by Benefit off better than anything else, and if you know how well that mascara stays you know that's saying something. Not drying at all and I have very sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: moon-monkey

customer_reviews.title: Good cleanser, no scent
customer_reviews.text: This cleans great without drying. It rinses off completely and takes off waterproof makeup great. It has no smell, which I love. My favorite cleanser for the price.
customer_reviews.author: L.D.S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for a few weeks and love this product. I have VERY sensitive skin and also redness around my cheeks. It has helped reduce the redness and caused no breakouts. I use it with my silicone facial brush every night and it leaves my skin feeling soft and clean. It is a great first step to my nightly regimen and I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MNWalker

customer_reviews.title: Best facewash
customer_reviews.text: Best facewash! It doesn't cause irritation on your face when you have broken skin/popped pimples and doesn't dry out your skin after wash.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Better Luck Next Time First Aid Beauty
customer_reviews.text: Left me with an itchy rash in my chin area. Only used it twice! The rash kind of burns a little too. Afraid to put anything on it even though it feels dry because I don't know what chemical in this wash that caused this! I'm so sad about it too. Love the first aid beauty lotion but this is horrible.
customer_reviews.author: britneymae90

customer_reviews.title: Great cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a cleanser that didn’t strip the moisture out of my face. This has been great so far. I love the consistency, it foams up well and I feel clean and moisturized after. I purchased one for my mom as well and we both love it.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Noh

customer_reviews.title: Decent cleanser, I wouldn’t use if you have dry skin.
customer_reviews.text: I have normal to dry skin and was looking for something creamy and hydrating for my skins It’s a decent cleanser, but I was looking for something more gentle than what this product gave. The product states that it’s a non-foaming cleanser, but once you get going washing your face, bubbles start to form. I was slightly dry afterwards, so I use it at night after a day of makeupwear, or when I’m oilier.
customer_reviews.author: carter barber

customer_reviews.title: Nice cleanser
customer_reviews.text: Creamy, luxurious feeling cleanser. It smells great too. Only 4 stars bc I haven’t felt any improvement in my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen Scudder

customer_reviews.title: Removes make up and cleans great!
customer_reviews.text: Got a sample size from Ipsy and had to add this to my regular cleansing routine! Most cleansers make me break out but this one doesn't! It also gets all my make up off-- even my Wonder Brow make up!
customer_reviews.author: Sil Rain

customer_reviews.title: I’ll never use a different fash wash 😍
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product for about 4 years and my skin is living its best life. While this doesn’t strip all of the natural oils off of my face, I do still use a light moisturizer with an spf after. A little of this product goes a long way and just a tiny dot lathers up really nicely, so there’s great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Carver

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Takes all traces of dirt and make up off. Best thing I have found so far. I bought two more. One to have in the shower and by the bath.
customer_reviews.author: IndyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Really effective for removing make-up.
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first tube on the recommendation of a friend. The first time I used it, I was turned off by a musty odor. However, it was so good at removing mascara and eyeliner, I've continued to use it and no longer notice the weird odor.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline M R

customer_reviews.title: Magic Face Wash
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this face wash for about a week now. It has a clean smell and doesn’t not over dry my face. I have extremely sensitive skin and I am so glad I finally decided to try this product!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great facial cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely sensitive skin and this is the first facial cleanser that I am able to use daily.
customer_reviews.author: BJJ

customer_reviews.title: Calms my red sensitive skin quickly!
customer_reviews.text: This line of products has helped my skin so much. I initially purchased it somewhere else last fall & was glad to find it on Amazon. My facial skin is very sensitive & at times red & irritated from an autoimmune disorder. Calms & moisturizes quickly. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great for Sensitive Acne Prone Skin
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and have used it for years. I started using it when I started on accutane because it is not scented and good for sensitive skin and I have never looked back. This will forever be my holy grail face wash.
customer_reviews.author: Kamryn Sharpe

customer_reviews.title: good for skin
customer_reviews.text: I arrived late, so I ended up buying it offline. It removes makeup and is good for your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce J.

customer_reviews.title: Just the best
customer_reviews.text: I love this because it does not dry my face out or cause acne. A little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.author: mary m.

customer_reviews.title: I will never run out of this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I have super sensitive and breakout prone skin. This has been a game changer! I will never run out!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and effective
customer_reviews.text: Gentle cleaner. Easy to use. Daughter really likes it. Says it smells good and feels like lotion.
customer_reviews.author: Marla2015

customer_reviews.title: 😍😍
customer_reviews.text: I wasnt expecting anything from this face was tbh because i have oily acne prone skin. I love this. Sensitive and gentle, lightly foaming. Doesnt dry but does the job and does it well
customer_reviews.author: Lulu's limones

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Love love love. I used it when I was having chemo by recommendation. I still used it.
customer_reviews.author: Hortencia Mota

customer_reviews.title: Best Face Wash EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: My skin is sensitive to everything, except this. And surprisingly it does a better job removing all my makeup and mascara than other products. I've yet to have a reaction to it. I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I live this stuff and have used it for over a year. It works, but is so gentle.
customer_reviews.author: KH

product_meta.title: First Aid Beauty Pure Skin Face Cleanser, Sensitive Skin Cream Cleanser with Antioxidant Booster – 5 oz.
feature_bullets: Gentle Clean: Our sulfate-free and fragrance-free cleanser is strong enough to remove makeup, dirt, oil and grime without leaving your skin tight or dry
Antioxidant-Infused: Our powerful botanical antioxidant blend helps protect your skin while reducing irritation and inflammation
pH-Balanced: FAB cleanser works to maintain skin’s natural acidity and helps reduce flare ups, making it perfect for dry, normal or combination skin types

Free From: Alcohol, artificial colorants, artificial fragrance, lanolin, mineral oil, parabens, petrolatum, phthalates, propylene glycol, sulfates, talc, formaldehydes, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclocarban, ethanol, ethyl alcohol, denatured alcohol, methanol, N-butyl alcohol, isopropyl alcohol, SD alcohol
Dermatologist Tested: Our vegan & cruelty-free face cleanser is also allergy-friendly, gluten-free, nut-free, oil-free, soy-free, safe for sensitive skin and nano-free
